task.name: Play
task.text: There is no goal in the practice exercise! Just play around with the game and get familiar with how it works.

task.name: Growth
task.text: Your goal is to increase the number of spinning shapes in the system to 50 in as few turns as possible.

task.name: Growth Round 2
task.text: Could you have done better? Try again! Make 50 spinning shapes as quickly as possible.

task.name: Exploration
task.text: Your goal is to maximize the space between shapes. You'll need to figure out a way to keep the shapes from moving towards each other and congregating.

task.name: Exploration Round 2
task.text: Round 2! Use what you learned last time to maximize the space between shapes.

task.name: Mastery
task.text: Your shape is the circled shape in the middle of the screen. Your goal is to raise your shape's level as high as possible. Levels are gained by growing bigger.

task.name: Mastery Round 2
task.text: Think you could have done better? Use what you learned last time to try to do better this time by raising your shape's level as high as possible.
